title: Exploring the Amazon Rainforest
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through the world's largest tropical rainforest.
keyLearningsImprovements: Enhanced design using animations with AOS, significantly improving user engagement. Gained practical experience in setting up secure Firebase rules to protect real-time data. Learned to optimize components for performance and ensure accessibility compliance in dynamic content.

title: Discovering Top Universities Abroad
description: Learn about the best universities abroad and their unique programs.
keyLearningsImprovements: Improved SPA routing and responsiveness using React Router and Bootstrap, ensuring a smooth user experience. Learned to deploy and debug projects on Netlify for faster iteration. Mastered creating scalable UI components that adapt seamlessly across all devices while maintaining design consistency.

title: Marvel Movies: A Cinematic Universe
description: Dive into the world of Marvel movies and explore their epic storytelling.
keyLearningsImprovements: Developed dynamic star rating functionality, improving the interactivity of user reviews. Mastered React Router for seamless multi-page navigation and learned to handle dynamic paths for better scalability. Gained hands-on experience in Firebase authentication and integrating a secure backend to manage user data effectively.
